location.comm: The surrounding area is not very pleasant for walking.

cont.entity_a: The location is rather disappointing and not very scenic in Hong Kong.
cont.entity_b: This hotel is attached to the mall and cinema which was great because sometimes this location has unpredictable weather. Overall, the hotel provides a nice atmosphere.

room.comm: The rooms are clean and well-maintained.

cont.entity_a: The hotelâ€™s rooms are quiet and comfortable, but they may be a little darkly lit; for a more updated experience, booking a room on the Club floor is recommended.
cont.entity_b: The rooms are medium-sized, to a high standard, offering great views, although some guests found the beds a bit firm.

staff.comm: The staff were generally friendly and helpful.

cont.entity_b: While most of the staff were friendly and helpful, some were noted to lack training and professionalism in handling issues.

food.comm: The food offered is of great quality and taste.

cont.entity_a: The buffet breakfast offered an amazing variety and was plentiful, with delicious food available in the restaurant as well.
cont.entity_b: The multicultural food offered at the hotel is of great quality and taste, with a buffet-style dinner available every evening; however, the options can become repetitive for longer stays.

service.comm: There was free internet connection provided.

cont.entity_a: The 30 minute minibus service was really great and also free.
cont.entity_b: The hotel provided free DVDs for guests to watch.

cont.entity_a: The hotel features two restaurants and a comfortable Club area offering tea, coffee, and newspapers.

cont.entity_b: Guests particularly appreciated the daily cocktail hour and complimentary nibbles provided by the hotel.
